website_summaries.verdict: Sporting a finer level of video quality than you’d expect for the price, it’s a sturdy and well-rounded body camera. We’d recommend opting for a MIUFLY with more internal memory or a higher top resolution.
cons: This version comes bundled with 32 GB of internal memory, but there is no option to add more storage with an SD card

I called tech support for Amazon, and they said the company looks to be a Ghost Company as they couldn't contact them either. I hate to send back, and would rather the audio was fixed. However, I have no choice but to return item. Video is awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use

Only hiccup was figuring out how to charge, the first night it just stayed on standby in the dock until it woke me up with the low battery alarm. The only downside I would say is the weight, it's a bit heavy so it required something tough to mount on, like a plate carrier or vest.

customer_reviews.title: Saves me from complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera!!! Awesome sound and video especially paired with the external lens!!! I use this camera for work and works way better than i thought!!!
customer_reviews.author: ali torres

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention when setting it the direction are a little confusing
customer_reviews.text: I use this body cam for towing and recovery and it works great ! The sound and picture quality is great. The camera it self is very light . I also use it as a dash cam . This mount doesn't come with it but you can get it as an add on. The only thing I wished for for was body harness for the camera . The 2 clips it comes with real only works for your belt. The recording angle at this level is ok but chest line is the best . Ended up buying a tactical vest . Overall this camera is absolutely awesome and a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: eugene lafountain

customer_reviews.title: Great bodycam so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am liking this body cam a lot. I use it for work as a patrol/supervisor for a security company here in Los Angeles. It takes very good video in Ultra HD. Plus I like the fact that I can record longer then 10 minutes like my old body cam only allowed for. Plus the video is in a mpeg format unlike my old one which used .mov format. Only downside is that the Miufly logo cam off which means if I have a problem and need to send it back I can no longer so so.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sinwell

customer_reviews.title: Dont leave home w/o it
customer_reviews.text: Im a retired cop but I bought this for personal use. There is something about me that makes every person I encounter think they can become belligerent and not one to shy away from confrontation I thought the camera wiuld serve 2 purposes: 1 pritect me against false accusations. 2. Provide insight as to why there are si A-holes out there Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jerome B. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in July 2019, I’ve literally only used it about three or four times since then, and now the camera has decided not to work properly. The night vision doesn’t turn on, the buttons don’t function the way they’re supposed to function, I can’t get to any other screen with the buttons. The only thing that happens is the little light in the front keeps turning on with every button I press, For some reason functionality just not working all it does is turn on and off that little front light everything else stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G.

customer_reviews.title: Downgrading Review
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to figure out just the basics, because, as with most electronics you get today, the instructions are pretty sparse, even online. The video is amazingly clear, though, and that is what I wanted. Used it as a dash cam and I won't leave home without it now. Edit: Downgraded review due to the fact that there is no way other than hooking up to a computer to delete video. Video does not record over and you can't delete video with an iPad or a smart phone. If you use it as a dash cam when you travel, you have to have your computer with you.
customer_reviews.author: DHH

customer_reviews.title: Misleading functionality
customer_reviews.text: Advertised to last a 8 hour shift with in inference of GPS and high resolution. This is NOT the case. When i only lasted 2 hours as a body cam I emailed the factory. They told me I had to turn OFF GPS, run at the lowest resolution and turn off all indicator lights including infra red. I followed the instruction and it lasted somewhere south of 6 hours. My intended purpose was body cam and also utilize as a vehicle cam. If it was sold as a vehicle cam and they were honest about functionality of the body cam I may have rated higher.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Bonneville

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Radios
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Family members who are in law enforcement. From what they have told me they like the size, weight of the item and is using it when they are going out on assignments. They were using outside one day when it was raining. They thought they had lost the footage but then realized it was waterproof. So all is good. They want me to order 3 more for their staff.
customer_reviews.author: Kindell Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Everything worked great (after we figured out the best way to mount ...
customer_reviews.text: we tested some features of this body cam and recorded with the camera,mounted in the car, approximately 3 hours of recording in total. Everything worked great (after we figured out the best way to mount it and some). Customer service answered our question immediately and completely. We haven't tried the little camera yet, but we expect it to work as well. Instructions are not too detailed, so some basic knowledge of electronics is required. All in all, a good experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Braeuner

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised, so many sound good but don't deliver like this one does...
customer_reviews.text: The manual was mostly very understandable, not like others that I had returned. There is a reason it is an Amazon best rated in category, it simply works as advertised... Have not used very long however, I feel the quality is very good and should work well for a long time..
customer_reviews.author: Raymann

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after i was assaulted while working for a package delivery company. While my vehicle had dash cameras, my body did not. This would have been invaluable if my dash cam had not picked up the assault. The quality is surprisingly great given the camera cost, and is light enough that you really forget it is there.
customer_reviews.author: Antivirus

customer_reviews.title: My new dash cam, plus mobility!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a dash cam for my driving, but was disappointed that almost all of them were plug-in to the vehicle for power. I was hoping to find a dash cam with a decent battery, and this body cam having a motion detection mode made it the best option imo. It's very sturdy and works great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but no video stabilization.
customer_reviews.text: So far, it works as it should and seems to be a well made item at its price point. The buttons work positively and the mounts it comes with are solid. It is rugged and has rubberized areas to protect it from major impacts. The only real complaint with it is there is no image stabilization at all. A Go Pro stabilizes the image so you don't get major shaky video. This thing is quakey shake all the way. If you are not smooth on your feet the video will reflect it. I like it overall, it is easy to mount, use and holds a charge so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Arabian

customer_reviews.title: Great camera bad belt clip
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Bad belt clip. This is a total V shape clip that works on thin attachments. I have a thick leather belt for holsters. Clips usually allow some thickness for this type of belt. My camera is laying somewhere on a 10 mile stretch of road after taking a motorcycle ride. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Bozemanscrossing

customer_reviews.title: Miufly 1296
customer_reviews.text: I work in security and have been a LEO for 33 years, but for my purpose, I use the body cam for security. The battery life is excellent as I work up to 10 hours and the Miufly stays on standby all that time. Haven't used it for recording yet but when I turn it on, the picture clarity is very good on the back screen. I hope I don't need to use it but I have it just in case. Either way, it's money well spent when something does happen.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I ride a motorcycle and was use this camera as a dash cam of sorts. Not long as I got it someone failed to secure their ladder to their truck and it fell in front of me on the freeway. I was able to avoid the ladder, and catch up with the vehicle including getting behind them about a car length back. Looking back on the footage on a full screen you are not able to read the license plate. While the quality appear pretty good, there may be an issue with finer details especially when in motion.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Solid More-Affordable Bodycam
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't justify the cost of the one some are using, but this is a great value for personal and small business. Battery is strong, quality is great, and security is firm. I'm glad it doesn't have a bunch of bluetooth and wifi bloat. I just need a rock that will be a silent witness.
customer_reviews.author: The Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for continuous (12hr day) recording using external battery
customer_reviews.text: Well designed. There isn't anything that I would change. Battery life is only 2 hours, contrary to claims. (I record HD and infrared sensor is set to AUTO.) So I use an external battery, connected to the side mini USB port. I record continuously through a 12-18 hour day. The heavy duty USB cable included with the unit must be used. At first I was using another cable and was experiencing problems that I thought were due to the camera unit.
customer_reviews.author: Wo'O Ideafarm

customer_reviews.title: Important to note: keep the password simple...I'm constantly reviewing  my recording.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Miufly Body Camera for my personal security at a large Hotel. The camera has amazing picture quality...but the playback in audio was poor. No matter where I put the body camera...(hip or chest) the playback sound was almost silent. I decided to purchase the 30.00 dollar attachment mini cam...and boy, what a difference...sound was 100% better..once attached..w/o the attachment the camera would have been 2 stars...but with the attachment 4 stars...I'm pleased with the product...Wish the makers could have added a remote to the device.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on all my delivery gigs along with my trail walks. It seems to be a solid unit and works great. I was able to figure out how to operate it without reading the manual so, it's a fairly simple unit to navigate. It's got night vision, a flashlight and even a strobe light mode. I came across the strobe light by mistake by holding in the take a picture button lol. Also it's easy to switch between 720P & 1080P on the fly, by simply holding in the mic button for a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Herman

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you do all research, but great product
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to navigate and downloading is temperamental on my department computer. Still had to buy a laptop to be able to offload camera data. Make sure you get something for this to be able to hold onto. Mine dropped twice while running because the clip wouldn’t hold the material. If you get a mic loop then it seems to work okay. Picture quality and audio is freaking awesome. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Good functionality but the battery...
customer_reviews.text: Good product by size/weight and functionality. However, the battery does not last an 8-hour shift. I'm getting 6 hours from a FULL charge, at best. I've even turned off some functions that may pull from it (30-second pre/post record, motion detection, GPS etc.) and it still doesn't give me anywhere over 6 hours. I'm not even recording events during this time. I may return this for a different camera that will give me more time. The video and photos are sharp with good audio and infrared lighting. Too bad the battery can't keep up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Unit seems to meet all my expectations. Haven’t tested the night vision or motion activation yet so no comment there but daytime use has yielded some good experiences with the equipment. Am a former military cop and it’s gotten to the point where I want to be able to record events around me while at the mall shopping, driving or Just about anywhere in public. This unit Seems to be dependable, holds a charge and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Therrien

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult to delete videos
customer_reviews.text: I took it to work and gave it to my it guy he tried everything to load the program so we could delete the videos and start all over again it was seemingly impossible I still have a camera full of content that I cannot delete that of course I cannot use a camera now.
customer_reviews.author: GSR.RESCUE

customer_reviews.title: Great event recorder
customer_reviews.text: In the world today, this is more useful than you might think. It charges fully in a couple of hours and can operate 8 hours one one charge. If you are using it just in daylight, it could run longer. The night vision is not as good as the day recordings, but much better than I've seen on other IR cameras. For the money and features, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stealthdan

customer_reviews.title: FAILED AFTER SEVERAL MONTHS OF USE...MEMORY FAULTY

customer_reviews.author: David B Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Nice bodycam
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this camera. It would 5/5 stars if the GPS program that is contained within the camera did not produce a virus warning upon plugging it into my computer. The camera quality was great. The night vision was amazing. For what it’s worth, the night vision mode will have 4 moderately visible red IR LED lights on the front which is producing the lit image. Playback on the camera is easy. The only issue I’d say other than the GPS playback program is the audio isn’t the greatest. People have to be talking loudly for this to hear clearly. Other than that, pick it up. It was nice and no fuss, no muss.
customer_reviews.author: Gomer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not so waterproof
customer_reviews.text: in the headline of the product it says "waterproof." NOT!!!! Fell off my uniform in to the water (about 2 foot deep) for about 10 seconds and pulled out. I was could see that the video was still going. I shook it and remounted to uniform. Later could see condensation in the lens and screen. Even later it started to buzz and "Crackle." I was surprised that WaterProof doesn't obviously mean what you think it means... Called Amazon Customer Service and was a hassle free return. I promptly re-ordered though, good NON-WATERPROOF product.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.author: Laura Feher

customer_reviews.title: This Body Camera Is Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: As indicated - Picture quality; sound quality; battery life = incredible. Also incredible is the sound sensitivity (picks up softer/lower volume sounds easily) & capturing video in low light situations. I recorded many events on my trip to Central America in 720P and the video quality was amazing, as was the audio. Very easy to back up the contents on the camera. This unit is well built and very rugged. This unit has fantastic quality and performance at a great price!!! I cannot say enough good things about the MIUFLY 1296P HD Police Body Camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: EeeTtt

customer_reviews.title: The camera was worth it for me. No more he said she said just watch the video.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent! This a well designed and well made unit, solid, reliable, and EASY to use. I am pleased with the auto night vision feature and how it is able to adjust between street lighting and dark areas on the fly. Also the MP4 recording format is easy to download and work with. Video and audio quality are excellent. I highly recommend this model.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera even at night.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. I use it at night and the picture is very clear. My only complaint is that the battery on a single charge doesn’t last as long as advertised but I’m able to work around it.
customer_reviews.author: SCSHRK

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won’t regret it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order. Our department paid more than twice the price for the exact same camera, but paid extra for the ‘name’. We currently run 5 cameras at our department, 3 name brand and 2 of these. You can NOT tell the difference. In fact, you actually have more menu options available with this camera. We will definitely be ordering more of these, very impressed and absolutely easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S

customer_reviews.title: Best bodycam for the money in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Best bodycam for the money in my opinion. I will actually be using it to film "B" roll for a movie project. Built in mic is extremely touchy though. Even picks up my heart beat when wearing it. Not so touchy away from the body and if you carry it with your hand by the long clamp it picks up every move you make. Best on a camera rig or stabilizer if you are filming movies or soething where sound matters. This is NOT a movie camera, obviously but it is pretty awesome non the less.
customer_reviews.author: Nacklepest

customer_reviews.title: Over heat too fast
customer_reviews.text: The bad thing about this body camera it gets over heated real fast.

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Expectations!

Now i can record it lol. This body cam does everything it says and more! But a nice little surprise was this little clip adapter that was not listed! With this little thing i was able to purchase a nice back pack strap mount that is originally for go pros.... And im sooo happy about that!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: 5 months with no problems
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 5 of these units for my security officers. After 5 months of regular service, I have heard no complaints and none of the units have come back with any problems.

customer_reviews.title: Great duty bodycam

Already have footage that has assisted me. Other officers are impressed with it and getting one theirselves. Will try and do an update a few months down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Franklin

customer_reviews.title: High quality at super low cost
customer_reviews.text: I use this for law enforcement purposes and I most say this is a very reliable and high quality body camera. I am really amazed at how cheap the cost is. Most department issued cameras are 3-5X the cost. If you are in law enforcement and you department doesn't issue body cameras, then I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Florida

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a LEO on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy for me to activate and deactivate. Through my departments policy every contact must be recorded if you have a body camera or audio recorder. So far it seems to have enough life to do that and storage to keep up. Haven't had a need for the infrared lighting at night since my lights are pretty bright. But messing around with it, it seems ok. Overall I am very pleased with this item. It is an affordable solution to an ever growing problem of false accusations.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Thibault

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product & quality

The only little thing is finding a good spot for it on his chest. I think there may be an accessory to put to clip on. But he says that might be too many things to have on him. Other than that minor thing incredible product, highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Decent

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and quality.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend

I also bought a ram mount and use part of this with the ram mount on my motorcycle handlebars.

customer_reviews.author: D. S.
